# CloudAppEvents

Information about activities in various cloud apps and services covered by Microsoft Cloud App Security.

|Attribute|Value|
|---|---|
|**Resource types**|-|
|**Categories**|Security|
|**Solutions**| SecurityInsights|
|**Basic log**|Yes|
|**Ingestion-time transformation**|Yes|
